roleset.name: bear again (most often occurs with arg1 only to indicate spiritual awakening)

example.name: passive, arg1
example.text: Even two decades ago in Go Down , Moses Faulkner was looking to the more urbanfuture with a glimmer of hope that through its youth and its new way of life the South might be reborn [*]and the curse of slavery erased [*-3] from itssoil .

roleset.note: REBEAR-V NOTES: Framed by Neville. (from rebear.01-v)
